DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine whether sequence variation lipoprotein lipase ( LPQ ) gene affect amount weight loss metabolic response hypocaloric diet treatment overweight obese ( BMI=25-35 kg/m2 ) , old ( 50-65 yr ) , sedentary veteran .
DOC.brief_title: Genetics , Metabolism Weight Loss Older , Obese Veterans
DOC.detailed_description: Veterans 50-65 yr , non-smoking , sedentary weight stable BMI 25-35 kg/m2 ( 120-150 % desirable body weight ) recruit screened via telephone , medical history , physical exam . Exclusion criterion : diabetes , hypertriglyceridemia ( > 400 mg/dl ) , history cancer myocardial infarction , clinical depression , renal , liver hematologic disease , medication affect glucose lipid metabolism ( thiazide , estrogen replacement , beta-blockers ) . Changes total visceral body fat measure dual x-ray absorptiometry computerize tomography , rest energy expenditure fat oxidation rate indirect calorimetry , lipoprotein lipid enzymatic assay . Glucose tolerance assess three-hour oral glucose tolerance test measurement glucose- insulin level every 30 minute . LPL activity measure 3050mg piece subcutaneous abdominal gluteal adipose tissue .
DOC.criteria: 5065 yr , nonsmoking , sedentary weight stable BMI 2535 kg/m2 ( 120150 % desirable body weight ) recruit screened via telephone , medical history , physical exam . Exclusion criterion : Diabetes , Hypertriglyceridemia ( > 400 mg/dl ) , History cancer myocardial infarction , Clinical depression , Renal , liver hematologic disease , Medications affect glucose lipid metabolism ( thiazide , estrogen replacement , betablockers ) .
